2nd- The game will crash if you have a lower resolution display so you have to re patch the game to your resolution:

1-secondary click the Silent hill game
2-Show package content
3-Open wineskin
4-Select Advance
5-In configuration, select "Browse"
6-Browse to "Program Files/Konami/Silent Hill 2
7-Select "Silent Hill 2 HD Patch.exe
8-press "Test" bottom
9-Select you resolution and press "Patch"
10-repeate 5-6
11- Select "sh2pc.exe
12- close everything and test

I hope you can fix the game and enjoy.
